LanguageData.RimTalk.TickManager.ApiKeyMissing: RimTalk: API key or Endpoint is missing.
LanguageData.RimTalk.TalkService.QuotaExceeded: API quota exceeded. Try reducing prompt size or increasing cooldown.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.OverrideInteractions: Override all interactions with AI dialogue
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.OverrideInteractionsToo: Enable this to allow AI to override and regenerate dialogue for all interactions (including vanilla RimWorld and other mods). Note: AI dialogue has a cooldown period set above. To generate dialogue more frequently, lower the cooldown.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.HideSkippedMessages: Hide messages when AI processing is skipped
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.HideSkippedMessagesTool: When enabled, interaction messages that were not processed by the AI (due to cooldown or other reasons) will be completely hidden. This includes messages from other mods that would normally display their original text.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.DisplayTalkWhenDraftedT: Shows RimTalk bubbles even when pawns are drafted. This temporarily overrides bubble mod settings during talk generation.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.ExternalEditorTip: Tip: Use copy/paste with external editor for multiline editing
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.AutoIncludedTip: Tip: Pawn details (traits, relationships, race, age, etc.) are auto-included. Write generic instructions that work across all characters and colonies.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.RateLimitWarning: Warning: Longer prompts will consume more tokens and hit rate limits faster. No prompt caching is used.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.BubbleFadeTip: Tip: Adjust the bubble fade time in the Interaction Bubbles mod settings to keep dialogue visible longer during fast-forward play.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.EventFilterTip: Tip: Only checked event types will be processed by AI. Uncheck types you don't want AI to respond to.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.NoArchivableTypes: No archivable types found. Try starting a game and then rescanning.
LanguageData.RimTalk.PersonalityEditor.Title: {0}'s Conversation Style
LanguageData.RimTalk.PersonalityEditor.Instruct: Describe how this colonist talks and behaves in conversations. This will influence their AI-generated dialogue.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.GoogleApiKeyDesc: Uses the free Gemma3 27B model. For other models or providers, use Advanced Settings.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.CloudProvidersDesc: Use online AI services like Google AI, OpenAI, etc. Requires internet connection and API keys.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.LocalProviderDesc: Use a local AI server running on your machine (Ollama, LM Studio, etc.). Must support OpenAPI.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.CloudApiConfigurationsD: If multiple APIs are enabled, the system will attempt to use them in order. If one API fails, it will automatically try the next enabled API in the list.
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.EnableDisableApiConfigT: Enable or disable this API configuration
LanguageData.RimTalk.Settings.EnterApiKey: (enter valid api key to fetch models)
LanguageData.RimTalk.Toggle.Tooltip: Toggle AI speech generation\n\nShift+click for settings
